title: Google sign-up 'fast track to surveillance', consumer groups say
description: Ten European consumer organisations join forces to launch complaints to privacy and data regulators

title: Canadian admits to hacking spree with Russian cyber-gang
description: Sebastien Vachon-Desjardins, who worked with the NetWalker crew, had $27m (£22.2m) in Bitcoin when arrested

title: Dogs given their own treat-dispensing game console
description: Plugging into a television, Go Dogo rewards pets that successfully follow commands.

title: New biometrics laws urgently needed, review finds
description: The Ryder Review finds existing laws are fragmented and have failed to keep up with technology.

title: NHS App to offer video consultations by 2024
description: Users will be able to receive messages from their GP and see their medical records, the government says.
